featured_projects.name: Learning List - GenAI Alignment Checker

achievements: Automated time-consuming manual alignment checking process
Reduced review time from hours to minutes (90% efficiency gain)
Improved accuracy of educational standard compliance verification
Enhanced EdTech product development workflow

featured_projects.name: Addy Healthcare - HIPAA Compliant AI Platform

achievements: Built HIPAA-compliant multi-tenant serverless system with data isolation
Automated referral processing reducing administrative burden
Improved patient care through AI-driven workflows
Implemented rapid tenant onboarding system

featured_projects.name: GenAI R&D Platform

featured_projects.name: Evoke Medical Care - Remote Device Monitoring
featured_projects.description: Full suite software solution for remote device monitoring including CIED quarterly checks, HF/fluid monitoring, and RPM data and hardware management.
achievements: Designed scalable medical device monitoring infrastructure

featured_projects.name: Mindera - Skin Atlas Data Warehouse
featured_projects.description: Comprehensive data warehouse and ETL pipelines for importing data from multiple sources with machine learning algorithm support. Scaled product to handle 500% more data sources (from 8 to 40+ external connections).
achievements: Built comprehensive data warehouse solution
Designed ETL pipelines for multi-source data integration
Scaled data processing to handle 500% more data sources (8 to 40+)
Enabled ML algorithm integration for therapeutic response identification
Implemented hybrid cloud architecture with seamless database integration

featured_projects.name: NxVision - Business Intelligence Platform
featured_projects.description: Data visualization platform that grabs data from all Nurix data sources and provides a single interface to view, manage, and create meaningful reports for tracking Business Milestones.
achievements: Built unified data visualization platform
Integrated multiple data sources into single interface
Enabled business milestone tracking and reporting
Improved deployment frequency by 400% (monthly to weekly)
